source: TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_SEQ_00<tab>Jannequinard has some exciting news.
target: TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_SEQ_00<tab>Jannequinard a une nouvelle importante à vous transmettre.

source: TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_SEQ_01<tab>An official request for assistance has come from a company of knights sent to Hemlock to reclaim the abandoned village. Journey to the Coerthas western highlands and find the knight commanding the operation.
target: TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_SEQ_01<tab>Les astromanciens ont été engagés pour soigner des chevaliers qui doivent faire face à de dangereux monstres aux Pruches, dans les Hautes terres du Coerthas occidental. Rendez-vous sur place et parlez au chevalier des Durendaire.

source: TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_SEQ_02<tab>The knights in Hemlock find themselves locked in a heated battle with a pack of terrible winged creatures. Without aid for their injured companions, that battle will surely be lost.
target: TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_SEQ_02<tab>Le preux chevalier vous a enjoint à commencer votre travail. Cherchez un de ses camarades blessés et soignez-le à l'aide de “Bienfaisance aspectée”.

source: TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_SEQ_03<tab>It appears more knights require Aspected Benefic.
target: TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_SEQ_03<tab>Vous avez soigné un premier chevalier. Cherchez un deuxième blessé et soignez-le avec “Bienfaisance aspectée”.

source: TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_SEQ_04<tab>It appears still more knights require Aspected Benefic.
target: TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_SEQ_04<tab>Vous avez soigné un deuxième chevalier. Soignez maintenant le troisième qui se trouve tout près.

source: TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_SEQ_05<tab>A knight you heal claims he heard a woman scream nearby. Hurry to see if Leveva is unhurt.
target: TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_SEQ_05<tab>Le troisième blessé vous a dit qu'il avait entendu un cri de femme peu avant que vous n'arriviez... Se pourrait-il que Leveva soit en danger<var 1D /var>? Retrouvez-la avant qu'il ne lui arrive quelque chose.

source: TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_SEQ_06<tab>You rescue Leveva and Jannequinard from several hungry creatures, only to have your warm reunion cut short by the arrival of Sevestre─the high-ranking Sharlayan official who hired Celie to capture Leveva. Sevestre has detained Leveva's ailing grandfather and tells her that if she wishes him released, she must return with him to the Old World.
target: TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_SEQ_06<tab>Vous avez sauvé Leveva et Jannequinard d'une mort certaine. Juste après votre acte de bravoure, un dénommé Sevestre, chef d'une faction du conseil des Sages nommée les “Archivistes”, est apparu devant vos yeux ébahis. Il semblait en avoir après le journal de Rufin, le père de Leveva... Avant de s'enfuir en voyant arriver Quimperain, il vous a prévenus que le conseil des Sages de Sharlayan avait envoyé une troupe d'élite à vos trousses. Parlez à Jannequinard.

source: TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_SEQ_07<tab>Leveva has gleaned from her father's journal that Sevestre was the mastermind behind Rufin's murder. Apparently, the Bibliothecs' leader sought to make the assassination look like an Ishgardian attack in order to strengthen his argument for abandoning Eorzea. Unfortunately, the journal─and the evidence it contains─now lies in the hands of he whom it would condemn. Jannequinard wishes to return to Ishgard so that you may discuss your options, but you should first report to the House Durendaire knight captain and see if he has further need of your services.
target: TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_SEQ_07<tab>Maintenant qu'elle s'est remise de ses émotions, Leveva est persuadée que Sevestre est à l'origine de tous vos malheurs depuis le début. Retournez auprès du chevalier des Durendaire pour lui faire votre rapport.

source: TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_SEQ_08<tab>The knight thanks you for your assistance and has nothing but praise for your efforts. You may now return to Ishgard with Jannequinard, Quimperain, and Leveva.
target: TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_SEQ_08<tab>Le chevalier ainsi que toute sa troupe étaient enchantés d'avoir collaboré avec vous. À présent, allez retrouver Jannequinard au collège d'astromancie Saint-Guenriol.

source:
TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_SEQ_09<tab>Leveva has decided to surrender herself to Sevestre and quietly return with the man to Sharlayan so that no harm may come to her grandfather and mother. Jannequinard has agreed to escort her to the abandoned Sharlayan city<var 1F /var>state in the Dravanian hinterlands, despite the fact his life may also be in danger.

※The next astrologian quest will be available from Jannequinard upon reaching level 60.
target:
TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_SEQ_09<tab>Pour empêcher Sevestre de réaliser ses plans machiavéliques de domination des esprits, Leveva doit absolument récupérer le journal de son père avant que la troupe d'élite sharlayanaise ne lui mette la main dessus. Continuez votre en<var 16 /var>traî<var 16 /var>ne<var 16 /var>ment si vous voulez avoir une chance contre le chef des Archivistes<var 1D /var>!
* Jannequinard propose la prochaine quête aux astromanciens de niveau 60.

target: TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_TODO_01<tab>Utiliser “Bienfaisance aspectée” sur le chevalier blessé

source: TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_TODO_02<tab>Keep casting Aspected Benefic on the wounded knights.
target: TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_TODO_02<tab>Utiliser “Bienfaisance aspectée” sur le deuxième chevalier blessé

source: TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_TODO_03<tab>Why aren't you still casting Aspected Benefic on wounded knights?
target: TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_TODO_03<tab>Utiliser “Bienfaisance aspectée” sur le troisième chevalier blessé

source: TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_JANNEQUINARD_000_000<tab>Word of Lady Leveva's charity has begun spreading, my friend. I have attended more than one luncheon where it was positively dripping off the tongues of all the good lords and ladies. And the knights? Oh, the knights. They have started rumbling about why magicks that not only heal the wounded, but also enhance the strengths of the healthy are not being employed to save the lives of those on the front lines.
target: TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_JANNEQUINARD_000_000<tab>Bienvenue, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Je ne sais pas si vous avez remarqué, mais grâce aux efforts de dame Leveva pour soigner les blessés de toute la région, l'astromancie commence à avoir vraiment bonne presse à Ishgard.

source: TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_JANNEQUINARD_000_001<tab>Needless to say, the Vault is not amused. Their plan to have us fade into obscurity has rebounded upon them, and now they are scrambling to twist this situation to their advantage.
target: TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_JANNEQUINARD_000_001<tab>Pour preuve, je viens de recevoir une lettre nous demandant de servir de soutien à des chevaliers au cours d'une mission périlleuse<var 1D /var>! Vous vous rendez compte<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_JANNEQUINARD_000_002<tab>Listen, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. The Vault would have us officially attend an operation currently underway in the western highlands village of Hemlock. The settlement was abandoned after the Calamity, and has since been overrun with beasts of all manner. The Holy See seeks to reclaim it, and my uncle, the count, has generously volunteered his knights to clear the area of any remaining threats.
target: TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_JANNEQUINARD_000_002<tab>Voyez-vous, les Durendaire ont l'intention de reconstruire Les Pruches, un village des Hautes terres du Coerthas occidental abandonné depuis belle lurette. Pour ce faire, ils ont besoin de débarrasser la région des monstres qui y ont fait leur nid.

source: TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_JANNEQUINARD_000_003<tab>It is win-win for the Vault. The operation is small enough and far enough away from the capital that even if it is a success, no one will pay it half a mind, but the Vault will be able to say that they answered the pleas of the knights. If, for any reason, the operation were to fail, then the Vault would be able to attribute the failure to the astrologian presence, and turn the High Houses against Lady Leveva.
target: TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_JANNEQUINARD_000_003<tab>La bataille sera âpre, mais ces chevaliers ont l'habitude de donner le meilleur d'eux-mêmes, sans oublier que c'est l'occasion rêvée de promouvoir notre art.

source: TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_JANNEQUINARD_000_004<tab>Dammy
target: TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_JANNEQUINARD_000_004<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_JANNEQUINARD_000_005<tab>I spoke with the lady about this, but she said she was not interested in the politics of the situation, only that it was her duty to aid people in need. We should speak with her, and soon. Let us make haste to Hemlock.
target: TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_JANNEQUINARD_000_005<tab>Dame Leveva et Quimperain sont déjà sur les lieux, accompagnés d'un chevalier des Durendaire qui nous donnera des détails sur la mission. Adressez-vous à lui dès que vous serez arrivé<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var>.

source: TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_JANNEQUINARD_000_009<tab>Reports from Hemlock claim the village is a veritable den of feathered dragons─the few remaining homes naught more than gutted shells. When we arrive, we should seek the commanding officer and have him direct us to our young charge.
target: TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_JANNEQUINARD_000_009<tab>Un chevalier des Durendaire nous attend aux Pruches, un village abandonné dans les Hautes terres du Coerthas occidental. Adressez-vous à lui dès que vous serez arrivé<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var>.

source: TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_DOORHEMLOCK_000_010<tab>You here to help with the operation? Word has it the battle has taken a turn for the worse...
target: TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_DOORHEMLOCK_000_010<tab>Vous êtes les astromanciens qui ont été engagés pour la prochaine mission, c'est ça<var 1D /var>? Allez-y.

source: TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_Q1_000_000<tab>Enter Hemlock?
target: TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_Q1_000_000<tab>Entrer dans Les Pruches<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_A1_000_001<tab>Yes
target: TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_A1_000_001<tab>Oui

source: TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_A1_000_002<tab>No
target: TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_A1_000_002<tab>Non

source: TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_JANNEQUINARD_000_010<tab>So this is battle... I... I never knew... All the blood...
target: TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_JANNEQUINARD_000_010<tab>La vie de chevalier n'a pas l'air de tout repos...

source: TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_LEVEVA_000_010<tab>There are wounded everywhere, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! We must help them!
target: TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_LEVEVA_000_010<tab>Ne perdons pas de temps. Il doit déjà y avoir de nombreux blessés.

source: TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_QUIMPERAIN_000_010<tab>What I lack in healing talents, I shall make up for with my blade.
target: TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_QUIMPERAIN_000_010<tab>Je me charge d'aider les chevaliers à éliminer les monstres. C'est ce que je sais faire de mieux<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_CAPTAIN02024_000_011<tab>We severely underestimated the strength of our enemies, and now my men and women find themselves overwhelmed. The tight wedges we had at the day's onset have all degraded into small knots of fighting, and the number of wounded is growing faster than our chaplains can heal them. Thank the Fury you arrived when you did.
target: TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_CAPTAIN02024_000_011<tab>Ah, voilà donc nos astromanciens au complet. Le nombre de blessés augmente encore plus vite que les flocons de neige qui s'entassent sur les montagnes du Coerthas, et j'exagère à peine. Dépêchez-vous de les soigner, vous nous rendrez un grand service<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_CAPTAIN02024_000_019<tab>Our wounded hide in the lee of yonder boulders for we have not even the means to pull their ailing bodies to safety.
target: TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_CAPTAIN02024_000_019<tab>Dépêchez-vous de soigner nos blessés, vous nous rendrez un grand service<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_WOUNDEDA02024_100_020<tab>It's so dark... Why is it so dark? Weren't we fighting during the day...?
target: TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_WOUNDEDA02024_100_020<tab>Aaaah... Je crois que je ne vais plus tenir très longtemps...

source: TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_WOUNDEDA02024_000_020<tab>Where am I? Where is my company? I must return to them!
target: TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_WOUNDEDA02024_000_020<tab>Ouf, ça va mieux<var 1D /var>! Merci à vous.

source: TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_WOUNDEDB02024_300_030<tab>There are others...with wounds still deeper than mine...
target: TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_WOUNDEDB02024_300_030<tab>Je crois qu'il y a des chevaliers qui ont plus besoin de vous que moi.

source: TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_WOUNDEDB02024_100_030<tab>Please... Help...
target: TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_WOUNDEDB02024_100_030<tab>Au... Au secours...

source: TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_WOUNDEDB02024_000_030<tab>I shan't forget this, astrologian. I am forever in your debt.
target: TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_WOUNDEDB02024_000_030<tab>Merci, vous êtes un ange<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_WOUNDEDB02024_300_040<tab>There are others...with wounds still deeper than mine...
target: TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_WOUNDEDB02024_300_040<tab>Je crois qu'il y a des chevaliers qui ont plus besoin de vous que moi.

source: TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_WOUNDEDC02024_100_040<tab>I once heard that at the end...your life flashes before your eyes... Why is it, then, I can only recall the bodice of that wench at the Forgotten Knight...?
target: TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_WOUNDEDC02024_100_040<tab>Par Halone... C'est déjà la fin de ma courte vie...

source: TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_WOUNDEDC02024_000_040<tab>You have my thanks, but there must still be many who require succor.
target: TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_WOUNDEDC02024_000_040<tab>Merci, aventuri<var 08 E905 ((ère)) ((er)) /var>...

source: TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_WOUNDEDC02024_000_041<tab>I heard a woman's scream beyond this very boulder not moments before you arrived.
target: TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_WOUNDEDC02024_000_041<tab>Au fait, j'ai entendu un cri de femme tout à l'heure... C'est bien une astromancienne qui vous accompagne pour cette mission, n'est-ce pas<var 1D /var>? J'espère qu'il ne lui est rien arrivé de grave...

source: TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_WOUNDEDC02024_000_049<tab>I did not recognize the voice. Could it have been one of your companions?
target: TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_WOUNDEDC02024_000_049<tab>J'ai entendu un cri de femme tout à l'heure... C'est bien une astromancienne qui vous accompagne pour cette mission, n'est-ce pas<var 1D /var>? J'espère qu'il ne lui est rien arrivé de grave...

source: TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_JANNEQUINARD_000_049<tab>They descended from the mountains. We barely had time to draw our globes...
target: TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_JANNEQUINARD_000_049<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_LEVEVA_000_049<tab>My arm was bit and my deck scattered. I do not think I can be of any assistance, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. You must forgive me...
target: TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_LEVEVA_000_049<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_SEVESTRE_000_050<tab>(-Robed Astrologian-)What have we here?
target: TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_SEVESTRE_000_050<tab>(-Astromancien mystérieux-)Voyons voir un peu si ce qui se cache dans ces pages valait la peine de devenir la fugitive la plus recherchée de Sharlayan...

source: TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_LEVEVA_000_051<tab>Sevestre? You who vowed never to set foot in this barbarian land again? Unless...
target: TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_LEVEVA_000_051<tab>S-Sevestre<var 1D /var>!? Qu'est-ce que tu fais ici<var 1D /var>? Toi qui as toujours eu une aversion sans pareille pour “ces barbares d'Éorzéens”, comme tu les appelles, ne me dis pas que tu as tout à coup changé d'avis<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_SEVESTRE_000_052<tab>Clever girl. Yes, it was I who hired Celie to bring you back to Sharlayan. And if you had come back with us quietly, you would be free right now, rather than a wanted criminal facing a trial, imprisonment, even execution...depending on what you have told these tamed savages of yours. Yes, my dear. I offered you a chance, and you foolishly refused it. The edict has been issued. And I am here to collect you.
target: TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_SEVESTRE_000_052<tab>Laisser son empreinte dans l'histoire demande nécessairement quelques sacrifices, ma chère Leveva, surtout lorsqu'on agit pour la gloire et l'honneur de Sharlayan.

source: TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_SEVESTRE_000_053<tab>Though, I must place some of the blame for that on our friend Celie. Had she not insisted on playing games, perhaps you would have displayed reason back in the Black Shroud. Instead, she merely added fuel to a fire already hot with your inherent stubbornness.
target: TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_SEVESTRE_000_053<tab>Cet ouvrage est décidément très instructif. Je vais m'empresser d'écrire un rapport à ce sujet.

source: TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_SEVESTRE_000_054<tab>And now I am forced to make the journey to this filthy realm to clean up her mess. And I suppose that starts with these companions of yours.
target: TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_SEVESTRE_000_054<tab>Sans oublier qu'il a coûté la vie à son auteur, et que sa fille a décidé de suivre le même chemin que lui...

source: TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_LEVEVA_000_055<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Take Jannequinard and leave... Right now. Neither of you are ready for magicks of the variety he wields.
target: TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_LEVEVA_000_055<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, prenez Jannequinard avec vous et partez vite d'ici. L'homme que nous avons en face de nous est ex<var 16 /var>trê<var 16 /var>me<var 16 /var>ment dangereux.

source: TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_JANNEQUINARD_000_056<tab>But what of you, my lady!?
target: TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_JANNEQUINARD_000_056<tab>Mais, Dame Leveva, et vous<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_LEVEVA_000_057<tab>I am going to reclaim my father's journal!
target: TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_LEVEVA_000_057<tab>... Je dois récupérer le journal de mon père<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_SEVESTRE_000_058<tab>Brave. Your father was brave. Your father is also dead.
target: TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_SEVESTRE_000_058<tab>Ha ha ha... Tu crois vraiment que tu peux modifier le cours de ton destin comme bon te semble, Leveva<var 1D /var>? C'est effrayant de voir à quel point ces barbares ont déteint sur toi...

source: TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_QUIMPERAIN_000_059<tab>Lady Leveva!
target: TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_QUIMPERAIN_000_059<tab>Dame Leveva, nous sommes là<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_SEVESTRE_000_060<tab>Ah, I now understand Celie's frustration. This realm is truly overrun with vermin. How we suffered here for so long, I will never know. Very well, Leveva. You leave me no choice.
target: TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_SEVESTRE_000_060<tab>Encore des imbéciles d'Éorzéens<var 1D /var>? Le simple fait de les regarder me donne des envies de partir vivre en ermite dans une île perdue de L'Écume des cieux... Je préfère quitter les lieux avant de me retrouver forcé de choisir une telle vie.

source: TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_SEVESTRE_000_061<tab>You may already know we have questioned Mace regarding your unauthorized passage into Eorzea. What you may <var 1A 02 /var>not<var 1A 01 /var> know, is that we still hold him...in the Dark Cells. Just as a precautionary measure, of course. We would not want to see him flee again before the trial.
target: TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_SEVESTRE_000_061<tab>Si tu tiens tellement à récupérer le gribouillis de ton père, tu n'as qu'à venir le chercher dans l'Arrière-pays dravanien. Je pense que je n'ai pas besoin de t'indiquer l'endroit...

source: TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_SEVESTRE_000_062<tab>Now, your grandfather is not as spry as he used to be, and I am uncertain how long the sanity a man of his age will last in complete darkness. Though, the longer you delay, the closer we come to finding out.
target: TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_SEVESTRE_000_062<tab>Au fait, tu ferais mieux de venir au plus vite. Tu es pro<var 16 /var>ba<var 16 /var>ble<var 16 /var>ment déjà au courant, mais le conseil des Sages détient déjà ton grand-père et vient d'ordonner ton rapatriement.

source: TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_SEVESTRE_000_063<tab>If you wish to see your grandfather released, you will come to the abandoned city in the Dravanian hinterlands. There, my airship will be waiting to take you back to the Old World where you will be tried. Fairly, of course.
target: TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_SEVESTRE_000_063<tab>Une troupe d'élite de Sharlayan est cer<var 16 /var>tai<var 16 /var>ne<var 16 /var>ment déjà en route pour te ramener de gré ou de force. Tu peux d'ores et déjà te préparer à croupir dans une cellule jusqu'à nouvel ordre.

source: TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_SEVESTRE_000_064<tab>I suppose you could run, but know that doing so would have grave consequences for your grandfather, and possibly your mother, as well. And, we would still eventually find you.
target: TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_SEVESTRE_000_064<tab>Mais ne t'inquiète pas pour ce journal, j'en prendrai le plus grand soin, hé hé hé...

source: TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_LEVEVA_000_065<tab>Wait! My father's diary!
target: TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_LEVEVA_000_065<tab>Rends-le-moi tout de suite, espèce de voleur<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_QUIMPERAIN_000_066<tab>He may still be close. Wait here!
target: TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_QUIMPERAIN_000_066<tab>Ne vous inquiétez pas, Dame Leveva, nous allons le retrouver<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_LEVEVA_000_069<tab>Sevestre... I knew it...
target: TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_LEVEVA_000_069<tab>Sevestre... Sois maudit<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_CAPTAIN02024_000_069<tab>I see you were forced to join the fighting as well. Luckily, your arrival provided us with just enough momentum to drive back the beasts.
target: TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_CAPTAIN02024_000_069<tab>Que s'est-il passé<var 1D /var>? J'ai cru que vous ne vous en sortiriez pas...

source: TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_JANNEQUINARD_000_070<tab>Lady Leveva, who was that? I have the strangest feeling I should know him from somewhere...
target: TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_JANNEQUINARD_000_070<tab>Dame Leveva, qui était cet homme<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_LEVEVA_000_071<tab>Sevestre─leader of the Bibliothecs─a powerful group of conservative fundamentalists who seek to control the whole of Sharlayan's knowledge. They believe that our people should not become involved in history, only be witness to it. Then analyze it until all the lives lived and lost are but numbers on a page.
target: TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_LEVEVA_000_071<tab>Sevestre est le chef des Archivistes, la faction la plus conservatrice et extrémiste du conseil des Sages.

source: TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_LEVEVA_000_072<tab>You may remember Sevestre, Jannequinard, because he is the selfsame man who has pushed for old Sharlayan to batten its doors...and has used my father's death as his rallying cry.
target: TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_LEVEVA_000_072<tab>Leur objectif est de devenir les gardiens de tous les savoirs à Sharlayan. Depuis l'exode, leur influence sur le conseil grandit sans cesse.

source: TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_LEVEVA_000_073<tab>And now I am certain that he had my father killed.
target: TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_LEVEVA_000_073<tab>Leur mainmise sur l'interprétation de l'histoire sharlayanaise commence à devenir très inquiétante. Ils empêchent leurs opposants de contester leur version des faits, et n'hésitent pas à utiliser les moyens les plus vils pour parvenir à leurs fins.

source: TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_LEVEVA_000_074<tab>Near the end of my father's diary, he mentions being contacted by a young Sevestre, who happened to be an older classmate of his when they were both at the Studium. Sevestre, looking to make a name for himself as a politician, warned my father against continuing to disseminate knowledge of Sharlayan astrology in Eorzea. A warning my father, of course, did not heed.
target: TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_LEVEVA_000_074<tab>Il suffit de voir ce qui est arrivé à mon père pour avoir osé se mettre en travers de leur chemin. Et maintenant, il est évident qu'ils cherchent à me faire subir le même sort.

source: TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_LEVEVA_000_075<tab>Soon after, several attempts were made upon my father's life. When he subsequently looked into the matter, he discovered that there was a price on his head...and that Sevestre had put it there. I discovered a contract signed by the wretch folded in my father's journal. He had planned on revealing it to the Forum on his return... But he never had the chance.
target: TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_LEVEVA_000_075<tab>Dans son journal, mon père a très clairement indiqué qu'il craignait pour sa vie. Nul doute qu'il avait sa petite idée sur l'identité de ses ennemis...

source: TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_LEVEVA_000_076<tab>Jannequinard. My father gave you that journal before he died...but you never once opened it?
target: TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_LEVEVA_000_076<tab>À mon avis, toutes les bandes d'assassins auxquelles nous avons dû faire face jusqu'à présent étaient envoyées par Sevestre lui-même. Voyant que nous étions plus forts que ce qu'il croyait, il a décidé de passer à l'étape supérieure<var 1D /var>: la manipulation politique.

source: TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_JANNEQUINARD_000_077<tab>I did not think it was mine to read... But what you say... If it is true... We must get that diary back. Come, it seems the fighting has died down. Let us report to the captain of the knights, then return to Ishgard so that we may plan our next move.
target: TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_JANNEQUINARD_000_077<tab>Je vois... À partir de maintenant, nous allons devoir être plus prudents que jamais. Laissons Quimperain le retrouver et pendant ce temps, allons faire notre rapport au chevalier qui nous a accueillis ici.

source: TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_JANNEQUINARD_000_079<tab>I do not know what to believe anymore... We must report to the captain and then hasten back to Ishgard. Perhaps then we can attempt to make sense of all that has befallen us here today.
target: TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_JANNEQUINARD_000_079<tab>En tout cas, notre mission est un succès. C'est déjà ça...

source: TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_CAPTAIN02024_000_080<tab>Many lives were saved because of you. If this is what we can expect from Sharlayan astrology, I see no reason why we shouldn't have knights trained in the field. I will recommend this to the lord commander. I suspect he will be pleased to see the day won with so few casualties.
target: TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_CAPTAIN02024_000_080<tab>Astromanciens, je tiens à vous remercier au nom de tous les chevaliers de mon régiment. Grâce à votre aide, nous avons pu réduire nos pertes comme jamais. Vous êtes clairement à la hauteur de votre réputation, et plus encore.

source: TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_JANNEQUINARD_000_081<tab>If you require our services again, you need only ask. Come, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Let us hasten back to Ishgard.
target: TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_JANNEQUINARD_000_081<tab>N'hésitez pas à faire de nouveau appel à nous si vous avez besoin de nos services. L'astromancie a le pouvoir de changer le cours du destin. Merci de votre soutien et à bientôt.

source: TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_CAPTAIN02024_000_089<tab>I applaud you and your companions on a battle well fought. We knights do not forget the bravery shown by our allies.
target: TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_CAPTAIN02024_000_089<tab>Grâce à votre aide, nous avons pu réduire nos pertes comme jamais jusqu'à présent. Vous êtes clairement à la hauteur de votre réputation, et plus encore.

source: TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_DOORHEMLOCK_000_089<tab>Will you be returning now, astrologian?
target: TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_DOORHEMLOCK_000_089<tab>Merci pour votre aide, vous avez été formidables. Nous serons ravis de collaborer avec vous une nouvelle fois.

source: TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_Q2_000_000<tab>Leave Hemlock?
target: TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_Q2_000_000<tab>Voulez-vous aller au camp des Deux-Rivières<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_A2_000_001<tab>Yes
target: TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_A2_000_001<tab>Oui

source: TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_A2_000_002<tab>No
target: TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_A2_000_002<tab>Non

source: TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_JANNEQUINARD_000_090<tab>Moments ago, we received a missive from the commander of my father's guard. He thanked us again for our assistance in Hemlock, and has formally requested that Lady Leveva train several of his knights in Sharlayan astrology.
target: TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_JANNEQUINARD_000_090<tab>Merci à tous pour vos efforts durant cette mission. Les chevaliers des Durendaire sont désormais du côté de l'astromancie sharlayanaise, c'est un fait<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_JANNEQUINARD_000_091<tab>The Vault, however, remains silent, and I believe this silence to be calculated. If the edict issued for Lady Leveva's extradition has arrived, they need only turn a blind eye to Sevestre's actions, until he has spirited the lady from the realm...and people simply forget she was ever here.
target: TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_JANNEQUINARD_000_091<tab>Avec un peu de chance, ils nous feront une telle publicité que les autres maisons se battront pour nous avoir à leur service.

source: TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_JANNEQUINARD_000_092<tab>But we are not going to let that happen...are we, my lady?
target: TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_JANNEQUINARD_000_092<tab>Mal<var 16 /var>heu<var 16 /var>reu<var 16 /var>se<var 16 /var>ment, j'ai aussi une nouvelle moins réjouissante pour vous. Quimperain n'a pas réussi à retrouver Sevestre.

source: TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_LEVEVA_000_093<tab>I am sorry, Jannequinard, but I no longer see how we cannot.
target: TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_LEVEVA_000_093<tab>Le connaissant, il est cer<var 16 /var>tai<var 16 /var>ne<var 16 /var>ment en train de s'entraîner à des techniques très dangereuses. Sa soif de pouvoir est absolument inextinguible. Il fera tout pour que la faction des Archivistes domine toutes les autres au conseil des Sages.

source: TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_LEVEVA_000_094<tab>Sevestre has my grandfather, he has threatened to take my mother, and he now has the one thing that could have saved them both─my father's journal.
target: TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_LEVEVA_000_094<tab>J'ai bien peur qu'il n'arrive à ses fins si nous ne le retrouvons pas au plus vite. Nous devons absolument récupérer le journal de mon père avant que la troupe d'élite sharlayanaise ne me mette la main dessus.

source: TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_LEVEVA_000_095<tab>No, Jannequinard. I cannot deny my fate any longer. I have done several readings since our return, and every one is the same. Deceit... Manipulation... Submission... My path is clear. You, however, can carry on. Sevestre has no authority over you, or you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. See that my father's dream is fulfilled... Promise me that much.
target: TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_LEVEVA_000_095<tab>Cependant... c'est un problème qui ne concerne que moi seule. Il s'agit de mon destin, et moi seule doit y faire face. Sevestre est beaucoup trop dangereux pour que vous vous risquiez à l'affronter.

source: TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_JANNEQUINARD_000_096<tab>I shall promise you that and more, my lady. Quimperain and I will see you to the place of meeting, and do whatever possible to make certain this Sevestre keeps his word.
target: TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_JANNEQUINARD_000_096<tab>Voyons, Dame Leveva... Vous ne pensez tout de même pas que nous allons vous abandonner maintenant. De plus, j'ai moi-même une dette envers Rufin. Je viens avec vous.

source: TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_LEVEVA_000_097<tab>You know that by attending me, you put yourself in danger. He has shown he will not hesitate to kill anyone who stands in his way. And now that he knows <var 1A 02 /var>I<var 1A 01 /var> know of his involvement in my father's death... But still you would stand by my side in my last moments in Eorzea. I do not deserve friends such as you...
target: TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_LEVEVA_000_097<tab>... Merci, Jannequinard. <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, sachez que je vous laisse libre de votre décision. Si vous décidez de nous prêter main-forte, revenez voir Jannequinard après votre en<var 16 /var>traî<var 16 /var>ne<var 16 /var>ment.

source: TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_LEVEVA_000_098<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Aether is the building block of all that surrounds us, meaning that everything is connected. Someone closely attuned with that aether can, in a sense, link themselves with others, feeling their joy, feeling their pain. Scholars of the soul call this empathy. Crystal-gazers and card-readers call it the wheel of fortune. We astrologians call it collective unconsciousness. Whatever you call it, I feel that bond with you. Both of you. Thank you.
target: TEXT_JOBAST580_02024_LEVEVA_000_098<tab>Vous avez fait énormément de progrès. Vous êtes désormais assez expérimenté<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> pour utiliser “Inconscient collectif”, votre nouvelle technique. Je vous garantis qu'elle vous apportera la recon<var 16 /var>nais<var 16 /var>san<var 16 /var>ce de tous vos alliés<var 1D /var>!
